sect3.title: Informations de configuration
sect3.para: Le script d'installation ci-dessous met à jour le catalogue.
Utiliser seulement la version 4.x la plus à jour de DocBook SGML DTD nécessite ce qui suit:

screen.userinput:
cat >> /usr/share/sgml/docbook/sgml-dtd-&sgml-dtd-version;/catalog << "EOF" -- Begin Single Major Version catalog changes --
PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook V4.2//EN" "docbook.dtd" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook V4.1//EN" "docbook.dtd" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook V4.0//EN" "docbook.dtd"
-- End Single Major Version catalog changes -- EOF
